objectives: Students will discuss technology in daily life using Neutral/Standard register language
Students will engage with Action/Adventure themed scenarios related to technology in daily life
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of neutral level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining technology in daily life content with Action/Adventure narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore technology in daily life through a Action/Adventure lens using Neutral/Standard language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a high-stakes action sequence involving technology in daily life

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice neutral register vocabulary related to technology in daily life in a action context
Students engage in action themed role-play about technology in daily life using neutral register
Students create original action themed content about technology in daily life in neutral register

discussion_questions: How would you describe technology in daily life in a Action/Adventure scenario?
What chase or pursuit might be involved in technology in daily life?
Can you create a Action/Adventure story about technology in daily life?
How does technology in daily life change when viewed through a Action/Adventure perspective?
What neutral register expressions would you use to discuss this action scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Action/Adventure situation involving technology in daily life
roles: Character A: Using neutral register in action context
Character B: Responding in neutral register within action theme

topic_genre_blend: technology in daily life with chase
technology in daily life with pursuit
technology in daily life with danger

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Neutral/Standard throughout: Standard professional communication
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Action/Adventure theme: High energy, excitement, physical challenges

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Neutral/Standard register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Action/Adventure themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of neutral register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
